name: Drainer
overview: 'Think before you act' is the maxim of this game. This game combines both shooter and puzzle elements. The object of this game is to destroy the enemy ship you are in. To achieve this you must go to the reactor and destroy it but in order to get to the reactor you must overcome all kinds of obstacles and enemies that are hindering you in the maze. Taking the wrong turn might be the end of your little ship.
